content.question: In the United States, 36 percent of the people have a blood type that is A positive. From a random sample of 150 people from Norway, 66 had a blood type that was A positive. Consider a hypothesis test to investigate whether the proportion of people in Norway with a blood type of A positive is different from that in the United States. Which of the following is the standard deviation used to calculate the test statistic for the one-sample <math alttext="z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-test?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.24 times 0.76 over 150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.24</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.76</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>150</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.44 times 0.56 over 150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.44</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.56</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>150</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.36 times 0.64 over 150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.36</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.64</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>150</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 0.44 times 0.56 over the square root of 150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.44</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.56</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>150</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 0.36 times 0.64 over the square root of 150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.36</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.64</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>150</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.36 times 0.64 over 150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.36</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.64</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>150</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
